about_the_game:
GoreTears takes you on a journey through high mountains, dark forests, forgotten cave ruins, and dangerous temples. Mia - the main character of the game, one of the members of the expedition, goes after her guild, which decided to go without her. On her way, Mia runs into many abandoned tents, as well as into some of her allies who help her figure out what happened. A series of events and battles with orcs, animals and forest monsters leads the main character to the cave, where she comes across a forgotten crystal that first saves her, and then helps her control time...



  • Graphics - the game is made in 2D pixel art, presenting a variety of locations for the whole adventure, ranging from filled with life forests and mountains, ending with lava caves and forgotten cities.
  • Time slowdown mechanics - which will help you more than once to deal with dangerous enemies and traps, slowing down everything around you ... or not everything?...


  • Combat system - combining a variety of attacks with deadly spells will help you deal with enemies on the way.

  • Craft - find and mine ores, gems, and materials that you will need in your adventure.
  • Leveling - You can improve your spells and abilities by choosing an ultimate ability at the end, greatly improving one of your spells or attacks.
  • Enemies - each location is filled with its own unique enemies and mechanics, and each of them will not let you kill themself just like that.


  • Characters - along the way you will meet a wide variety of creatures that will be inclined to you in different ways, often hiding their dark secrets and stories behind their words

short_description: GoreTears is an action-platformer with RPG elements that tells about the adventures of traveler Mia, searching for the expedition that has gone into the mountains. She will meet a mysty crystal that will enable her with power over time, and also turn the adventure in a totally different direction...
